title: So what do you do when riot screws you over with MMR?
body:
Play dota 2?
Does MMR deteriorate over time so you can go away and come back in a few months?

cause as a support of sick to death of this bs system where you play your peers, do well, so rito flicks a switch and starts pitching you with bronze team mates to vs. plats with "cause you know supports with the lowest amount of gold balance bad carry matchups."

just totally over the roller coaster ride that is this lame arse pathetic Dota2 supporting hidden MMR stat that results in games decided on load or even pre load.

I get it, for the next 5-10 games i am going to lose. Then with a nose dived MMR i will then win the majority of my next ten.

Both of which sucks. I play  LOL for that 1 in 10 game that is BALANCED and as a result a total blast

Why does the player base tolerate this shit?

What shall i do? I know if i click play i am going to lose. its decided, a done deal. me as an average player will be in a team of players completely outclassed by their opponents.
Rigged like the US elections

replies.body:
Check out my match history.
Straight wins
To straight losses. (yes one i cause, was assigned top? been nothing but sup since sup became rare as hen teeth so way out of touch)

Fuk this mmr system and man i am a sadist playing this game.

Well no, if it were rigged like the US elections you'd have a team of Bronze Vs beating a team of Challengers.
Since it really was Hilary's rigged election to lose.

You can go play DOTA2 if you want, but it's far far worse there.
Valve have even less of an idea what match making is than Riot do, at least Riot started with matchmaking and has been working on it for years, Volvo just barely picked it up and has no idea what to do with it.
If you want someone who has matchmaking almost worked out, try Blizzard.
Though I'm not sure how it well their MM works in HotS since I refuse to play that piece of shit, but it does work quite well in StarCraft2 and Overwatch.

Match making is also really good in world of warcraft ranked pvp, you usually get paired against someone within a 5 mmr delta of your total team mmr, which makes for some very balanced fights (boosters, smurfs, and cheese comps aside)

Granted its usually really easy to tell a smurf from a regular player, because they Will absolutely destroy you no matter the class match up.

Wasn't really rigged, its just a country full of retards who willingly let criminals be the top candidates, then vote for the criminal with a worse record to be the president because of his empty lies.
